name: Diodius ~PREMONITION~
description:
You are just graduating from military school to serve in the defense of Bromberg. Unfortunately, it turns out that you are needed immediately - the ancient enemy, the Shadow Doge, has returned and plans to attack Bromberg! You must be ready, prove your worth, and defeat the Shadow Doge. Experience unforgettable adventures in this unique game from the genre of Shoot'em Up!

FEATURES:
  • Classic arcade Bullet Hell/Shoot'Em Up action, with modern features, such as achievements, cloud save and "XD-mode" New Game+!
  • Story mode full of adventures and challenges!
  • Advanced weapon unlock system - unlock as many as 100 weapons!

Game also available in Albanian/Lojë gjithashtu në dispozicion në gjuhën shqipe
